headline: Barclays Reiterates Buy Rating on Charles Schwab (SCHW) Shares Stock
summary: The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW) is one of the Top 10 Stocks Warren Buffett Would Buy in 2026. On February 17, 2026, Barclays analyst Benjamin Budish reiterated a Buy rating on The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW) and kept a price target of $120. Notably, the firm’s analyst participated in the company’s fourth-quarter 2025 earnings call […]
